About the "dependency resolution failure" scenario: is this something that happens on regular basis, something on the user can react (or should be at least informed in a sane way), or does it only happen in exceptional cases (bug in modulemd)?
If I understand it correctly, it should be safe: the filters validation runs also in the ContentProjectValidator in earlier phase, preventing the user to even start the build.
